creator: tjsb@slb.com
text:
There are various links at the start of the help window, as well as 
internally, and it would be nice if these worked.

==

I've taken this call because I've done some work on this already. Patches to 
follow.

Note: it appears that there may be a Java HTML parsing bug - it looks as if it 
does not like the <!-- FOOTER --> comment between two table elements. This can 
hopefully be fixed by a minor change to the Anakia stylesheet(s) - if not, Ant 
can be used to remove the comment.

Created attachment 6698
HTMLPane.patch - add link handling
creator: tjsb@slb.com

text:
Created attachment 6699
Remove FOOTER comment from docs and printable docs
creator: tjsb@slb.com
tjsb@slb.com
text: Seems to be working OK now, at least on Java 1.4.1_02.
